p: THF-6 offers an alternative to oral diclofenac for the short-term treatment of moderate-to-severe osteoarthritis of the knee. Administration of THF-6 was shown to be noninferior to oral diclofenac in relieving knee pain. None of the outcome measures assessed in this trial favored either THF-6 or oral diclofenac with respect to symptomatic osteoarthritis of the knee.
